# Update Subscriber

# Description

Update subscriber in a list of an account.

# Untitled Section

text="Type the content"

# Configuration

Account - Select the account from the drop-down list or enter a custom account ID. This field supports String type input.Subscriber email - The email of the subscriber. This field supports String type input.Email - The new email of the subscriber. This field supports String type input.Name - The name of the subscriber. This field supports String type input.









* Email - New email of the subscriber. Automatically generated output variable.
* Subscriber - Automatically generated output variable.
